I don't have an answer to that question. But I do know a NexusBytes VPS will work, 366 days a year! Yet another reason to join the family, if you haven't <3.  

>Here at Nexus Bytes, we do things differently. You are not just a customer or another line in our CRM database. You are part of the Nexus Bytes family and we only want the best for our family. We are not going to sell our family members what we won’t buy for ourselves. That’s the Nexus Bytes difference.

**By popular demand, we are bringing back MegaDealsThursday :)**

1 Extra day gave us the perfect reason to run some super limited clearance promo. Just like Feb 29th doesn't occur every year, this promo won't appear again. Stock is limited. Only available in Germany :)

**LeapYearSpecial - Germany Only**

    * RAM: 2 GB

    * CPU Core: 2 @3.4+ GHz (Fair Share Ryzen 7 1700X)
    * IPv4: 1
    * Location : Germany
    * Free Blesta Billing Software 
    * Free Windows Server 19/12 Standard License
